body:
Hello,


I am completing my PhD on daylighting simulation and I need any of CIE
performed validations of the Radiance in order to satisfy bureaucratic
procedures.


Has the Radiance been tested against CIE TC 3.33 test cases?


Best Regards,
Ilya
